caption.center: DALE E. DRAKE COMPANY, Respondent, v. JOHN M. FLUKE, JR., ET AL.,

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from the Superior Court for King County, No. 88-2-05997-7, R. Joseph Wesley, J., entered May 21, 1998.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed in part and reversed in part by unpublished opinion per Coleman, J., concurred in by Webster and Cox, JJ.
